fields.name: Definition
fields.description: Has the definition for the export.

fields.name: DeliveryInfo
fields.description: Has delivery information for the export.

fields.name: Format
fields.description: The format of the export being delivered. Currently only 'Csv' is supported.

fields.name: NextRunTimeEstimate
fields.description: If the export has an active schedule, provides an estimate of the next run time.

fields.name: PartitionData
fields.description: If set to true, exported data will be partitioned by size and placed in a blob directory together with a manifest file. Note: this option is currently available only for Microsoft Customer Agreement commerce scopes.

fields.name: RunHistory
fields.description: If requested, has the most recent run history for the export.
